variables.input: cloud_application, service, host, cloud_application_namespace, kubernetes_cluster, kubernetes_service, process_group

0.content:
# Get an overview of entities with and without ownership
This dashboard allows you to get an overview of entities that are assigned to a team or that are not yet assigned to any team.
Select your team (or "No Team) and the entity type you are interested:
- **No Team**: Will show all entities that currently do not have a dt.owner defined
- **TEAM**: Will show you all entities this team has ownership for

2.title: Entities with selected Team Ownership
